whatIs.title: What is Shakespearean Translator
whatIs.description: The Shakespearean Translator by VibeTrans is a unique tool that transforms modern English text into the rich, poetic language of Shakespeare's era. Ideal for students, writers, and language enthusiasts, it enriches understanding of Elizabethan English by providing an authentic translation experience. Whether you're crafting a play, writing a novel, or exploring historical linguistics, VibeTrans offers an engaging way to bridge the gap between contemporary and classical English.

examples.title: Sample Shakespearean Translations
examples.description: Explore authentic translations from modern English to Shakespearean style. These examples demonstrate how everyday phrases transform into eloquent Elizabethan prose, showcasing the poetic beauty and distinctive grammar patterns of Shakespeare's era including 'thee,' 'thou,' and archaic verb forms.

items.alt: Hello, how are you today translation showing Shakespearean greeting with thou and art
items.name: Hello, how are you? → Hail, how art thou this day?

items.alt: I love you very much translation demonstrating Shakespearean romantic expression with thee
items.name: I love you very much → I do love thee most dearly

items.alt: Thank you for your help translation showing Elizabethan gratitude with thy and assistance
items.name: Thank you for your help → I thank thee for thy assistance

items.alt: Where are you going translation demonstrating archaic English whither and goest
items.name: Where are you going? → Whither dost thou goest?

items.alt: Good morning my friend translation showing Shakespearean salutation with morrow
items.name: Good morning, my friend → Good morrow, mine companion

items.alt: I don't understand what you mean translation demonstrating Elizabethan confusion expression
items.name: I don't understand → I comprehend not thy meaning

howto.title: How to Translate Modern English to Shakespearean

steps.name: Enter Your Text
steps.description: To begin, locate the text input field on the webpage. Click inside the box to place your cursor there. Then, type or paste your desired text for translation into Shakespearean English. Ensure accuracy before proceeding.

steps.name: Select Translation Mode
steps.description: To select translation mode, navigate to the mode menu on the main screen. Choose between 'Modern to Shakespearean' or 'Shakespearean to Modern' by clicking the respective option. Confirm your choice to activate the selected mode.

steps.name: Initiate Translation

steps.name: Review and Edit
steps.description: Carefully read the translated text to ensure accuracy. Check for any errors or awkward phrases. Compare with the original to maintain meaning. Edit as needed for clarity and coherence, ensuring it retains a Shakespearean style.
